overview: For the sleepless in Seattle, Gus Mattox stars as the host of a late-night dirty-talk radio show inviting callers to describe their wildest sexual encounters. Chi Chi LaRue directs as Jay Varella and bad boy Bobby Williams put on a show for the whole neighborhood; hunky Tyler Riggz and Luke Strong work out all their muscles at the gym; and Dereck Hanson, Jake Deckard, and Jon Galt steam up a truckstop men's room in a dripping threeway fuck-suck-and-rim-fest. And when the radio show is over, the grand finale begins as Gus Mattox pairs with the sultry Nino Bacci for plenty of suck and fuck action... with a super-hot surprise twist at the end.
title: Night Callers
